name: FLY BAI, S.L.
about: FLY BAI, S.L., operating as FlyBy Aviation Academy, was established in 2008 in Bilbao, Spain, by two experienced pilots. The academy quickly obtained approvals for all training courses, including the EASA ATPL Integrated program. In 2015, new management implemented a vision to provide affordable, all-inclusive pilot training to an international audience. With over 1,500 students from 112 nationalities, FlyBy offers a 14-month ATPL course featuring extensive classroom and flight training, state-of-the-art facilities, and a modern fleet of aircraft. Based in Burgos and Logro√±o airports, FlyBy ensures a safe, efficient, and supportive learning environment, preparing students for successful careers in aviation.
